title: [1.8~1.7.2][ssp/smp]更多弯曲动作MOD-Mo’ Bends[HAYO]
author: 压力马斯内
txt_content:
本帖最后由 787878b 于 2016-2-6 10:14 编辑 

HAYO studio出品更新：2015/6/14  蜘蛛更新！




这个MOD添加了更多弯曲的动作如果你觉得Minecraft人物可以更真实些，而不应该是永远那样死板，那么这个Mod可以实现你的猜想！新版本添加了剑术相关动作，将来还计划添加更多动作~

已有玩家动作：站立行走奔跑跳跃冲刺跳跃游泳三剑攻击拳击潜行

已有僵尸动作：
站立行走

已有蜘蛛动作：站立行走跳跃攻击爬墙

通用效果：
剑挥动的痕迹
自定义伤害效果
自定义死亡效果
自定义动画
未来计划：- 更多生物动作 (苦力怕、蜘蛛等) - 更多动画效果（斧头挥动、采矿、飞行等）- 更多可自定义的动画效果！


截图欣赏：
















你想要自定义外观？请打开本MOD的菜单键！（默认为“G“键）




下载：1.8：Minecraft 1.8 —0.21.2度娘网盘Minecraft 1.8 —0.21度娘网盘
1.7.10：
Minecraft 1.7.10 —0.21度娘网盘Minecraft 1.7.10 —0.20度娘网盘
Minecraft 1.7.10 —0.19度娘网盘
Minecraft 1.7.10 —0.10度娘网盘
1.7.2
Minecraft 1.7.2—0.15（1.7.2最新版）度娘网盘
原帖下载：http://gobbob.net/mod/moBends.php



原帖介绍：
If you think that Minecraft characters could be more realistic, instead of steady and rigid animations, this mod is just for you! 
It makes players seem alive, and adds epic sword animations! Don't worry, more animated mobs are coming in the future :). undefined
Player Animations: - Standing - Walking - Running - Jumping - Sprint Jumping - Swimming - Three Sword Attacks - Fist Punch - Sneaking 
Zombie Animations: - Standing - Walking 
General: - Sword Trails - Custom Hurt Effect - Custom Death Effect - Customization 
Future Updates: 
- More mobs animated! (Creeper, Spider etc.) 
- More animations! (Axe chopping, Mining, Flying etc.) 
- More customization! 
- More epicness! 


版本更新记录：Update #29 : about a month ago12/30/14-Bugfixes!Update #28 : about a month ago12/26/14-Fixed Bends Packs Loading!Update #27 : about a month ago12/25/14-Pack Managment bugfixes!-Hitbox & Username tag placement bugfix!Update #26 : about a month ago12/24/14-Customization Update!Update #25 : 3 months ago10/19/14-Added a 1.7.2 version of the newest build of the mod!-Bugfixes!Update #24 : 4 months ago9/20/14- Added the zombie animations,- Custom zombie hurt and death effectsUpdate #23 : 4 months ago9/19/14-Fixed the sword trails.Update #22 : 4 months ago9/19/14- Re-coded entirely.- Added a swimming animation.- Added a three combo sword attack animation.- Added a slick menu for customizing.Update #21 : 5 months ago8/11/14-Added Enderman animations.-Minor bugfixesUpdate #20 : 6 months ago7/22/14-Added scars over player's body which shows when the player's health is low.-Updated to 1.7.10.Update #19 : 6 months ago7/09/14-Fixed minor bugs.-Fixed the cut ankles and elbows.-Added a flying animation (WIP).-Fixed the sword swing animation.-The fist punching now applies while walking and running.-Applied every change to the Big Head preset.Update #18 : 7 months ago6/14/14-Fixed the spinning sprint jump bug.Update #17 : 7 months ago6/14/14-Added a new sprint jump animation, and changed the old one to falling animation.-Spider's model now applies to cave spiders as well.-Creepers now shake while exploding.-Creeper now moves it's body while walking.Update #16 : 7 months ago6/13/14-Changed creeper's proportions.-Added a possibility of disabling certain mob's animations.-Probably fixed the animation speed difference.-Tweaked the weapon swing animation.-Added a spider model.-Fixed the black enchanted armor bug.Update #15 : 8 months ago5/23/14-Added a 1.6.4 version of the mod.-Probably fixed the cape rendering.Update #14 : 9 months ago5/03/14-Probably fixed the incompatibility with Shaders.-Added Creeper animations (Work In Progress).-Added ZombiePigman's aggresive running and attack animations.Update #13 : 9 months ago5/01/14-Fixed the z"-fighting" of pixels that overlap eachother.-Probably fixed the animation speed.Update #12 : 9 months ago4/29/14- Adding Zombie animation presets.- Reduces the limb crack visibility.Update #11 : 9 months ago4/28/14-Updated to 1.7.2-Added new smooth animations-Added a new customization menu (default 'G' key)-Remade zombie animation & pigzombie animationUpdate #10 : about a year ago9/07/13-Updated to 1.6.2-Fixed multiplayer bug.Update #9 : about a year ago5/05/13-Updated to 1.5.2Update #8 : about a year ago4/24/13-Fixed small boots bug.-Fixed item hover above your hand when sitting on a pig.-Added bends for squid tentacles.-Added bends for all quadraped animals(pig,cow,sheep etc.)Update #7 : about a year ago3/22/13-Updated to 1.5.1Update #6 : about a year ago3/21/13-Fixed item movement bug.Update #5 : about a year ago3/20/13-Fixed skin bug.


本帖更新记录：2016/2/6 更新1.8  0.21.2
